title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.19 - 30/09/2015
body: On 30/09/15, starting at 04:00AM Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.19. At 05:30AM Sydney Time (19:30 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

replies.body: Not again! I JUST got my LoL working on windows 10 after about 5 weeks and then this patch happened and I'm back to a Black screen! aaagggh {{item:3070}}
same thing happened to me, i got the black screen after i logged into my account

I'm really liking that OCE are the first to get the new patches now.. But I just wish we got the official patch notes the day before, instead of the following day after the patch has already been put in.

But then everyone won't be able to play the game of "guess the rework" where everyone's first game on the patch is ranked and you must insta-lock your main and hope that it hasn't been reworked.

That being said, finding out your champ has been reworked on your first game isn't always THAT bad... {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:82}}

Riot still haven't fixed {{champion:27}} infinitely damaging Q (gas) stat display
is there any trouble with the shop? I can not buy any mystery skins or bundles.
What occurs when you attempt to purchase a mystery skin or bundle? Is it the same problem for both?
